tech_news.description: Verizon has already detailed the November Pixel update even though Google has not started rolling it out officially.

tech_news.description: The official Switch 2 memory card is also manufactured by Samsung.

tech_news.title: Researchers isolate memorization from reasoning in AI neural networks - Ars Technica
tech_news.description: Basic arithmetic ability lives in the memorization pathways, not logic circuits.
